name: await
description: Waits for other tasks to finish. **WARNING:** This is a blocking tool and makes you inefficient. **ONLY** use this if you have NO other tasks and cannot proceed until completion. It is **ALWAYS** better to perform other work and let results be pushed to you.

subcommand.name: default
subcommand.description: Waits for other tasks to finish. **WARNING:** This is a blocking tool and makes you inefficient. **ONLY** use this if you have NO other tasks and cannot proceed until completion. It is **ALWAYS** better to perform other work and let results be pushed to you.

options.name: timeout_seconds
options.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds (default: 240, min: 10, max: 1800)

options.name: tools
options.description: Comma-separated tool name prefixes to await for (optional; awaits for all if omitted)
